item.title: Who is willing to spend to keep up with the Dodgers and Blue Jays this winter?
item.description: Baseball insiders were abuzz over L.A. and Toronto at this week's winter meetings, as both have the money -- and pull -- to dominate the winter.

item.title: MLB winter meetings winners, losers and head-scratching moves
item.description: We debate our favorite (and least favorite) moves of the week -- and what's ahead.

item.title: What is dry needling and what happened to T.J. Watt? Answering key questions
item.description: Is dry needling common for NFL players? How long will the Steelers star be sidelined? Here's what we know.

item.title: Mendoza adds to honors, scores Maxwell, O'Brien
item.description: Indiana's Fernando Mendoza captured the Maxwell Award as the nation's player of the year and the Davey O'Brien Award as top quarterback Friday night.

item.title: Sources: Hoosiers DC Haines gets lucrative deal
item.description: Indiana has reached an agreement with defensive coordinator Bryant Haines that will make him one of the nation's highest-paid assistants, sources conf...
